nodes.text: A Midlithe crystal was a space mineral that consisted of an unstable fusion of crystal and metal. They were sometimes found adhered to the outer hulls of starships, especially in the Bright Jewel system. Nova Orion Industries was experimenting with these crystals to power landspeeders and podracers.

Midlithe crystals were introduced with the addition of the Ord Mantell space sector to Star Wars Galaxies in Chapter 8: The Nova Orion Crisis in January 2007. They can be found by destroying starships in the Ord Mantell system and are used to advance in the Nova Orion questline and to buy schematics for Nova Orion starship components.
